iti20:1.1: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti20:2.1: “Mendicants, when I’ve comprehended the mind of an individual whose mind is corrupted, I understand:
iti20:2.2: ‘If this individual were to die right now, they would be cast down to hell.’
iti20:2.5: Corruption of mind is the reason why some sentient beings, when their body breaks up, after death, are reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell.”
iti20:4.2: were to die at this time,
iti20:5.1: That sort is cast down as surely
iti20:5.2: as if they’d been carried off and put there.
iti20:5.3: For corruption of mind is the reason
iti20:5.4: sentient beings go to a bad place.”
iti20:6.1: This too is a matter that was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
